name: @raydeck/id-components
description: Utility library for unwrappable ID components

scripts.docs: typedoc --theme markdown --readme none --mode file --excludeNotExported --includeVersion --out docstemp && rm README.md ; mv docstemp/README.md docstemp/_library.md && cp TOP.md docstemp/README.md ; concat-md docstemp > README.md && rm -rf docstemp
scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn build && yarn docs && git commit README.md -m "docs: updating docs" && git push

author: Ray Deck
